description:
■ All music related functions are in this application. All-in-1 Music Player.

■ All-in-1 Music Player?
- Lyric function showing Lyric with its search.
- Language study function helps your study.
- the various Podcast recommendation function to help Language study.
- Gesture recognition function that enables various control according to finger motion.
- Timer function you can use to go to bed while listening the music.
- Music video and artist information.
- It is multi-functional Music player that integrated all convenient functions - - related to Music play.

■ Introduction of function

◎ [Study Mode] - You don’t have to spend lots of money.
Basic interval repeats and speed control, time jump function with your custom setting can efficiently support any language study of yours.

◎[Recommended Podcast] - Recommend various Podcast for interesting language study
The most interesting way to study foreign language such as English, Japanese, Chinese, German. You don’t have to find each Podcast for various genres but you can play streaming and download the file at one spot. 

◎[iTunes file share] - MP3 file management function of PC
The mp3 files of PC can simply be moved to the App and you can manage for the each folder.

◎ [Gesture recognition] - Function for comfortable music listening
You can set various functions (go to next song, volume control and more) according to the finger motion.

◎ [Search Music Video] - You can listen to the music and view video clip at the same time.
You can search the video clip of the song currently played and comfortably enjoy. 

◎ [Timer] - It helps your sweet dream.
Have you been worrying about all-night play of music when you go to bed?
Use timer function of the Music Player to go to bed with music.

◎ [Artist information] - When did the artist release the first album?
You can easily confirm artist profile, photo and more.

◎ [Share] - Wow, I like this song, suggest to friends!
You can easily share the song information with your friends via SNS.

◎ Other convenient functions
It includes various functions that will ease the music play such as play a next song by shaking the phone and share song information with friends, etc. Please use!
trackCensoredName: Music Player All-in-1 - Convenient Multi-function Music Player
trackName: Music Player All-in-1 - Convenient Multi-function Music Player
